import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import propTypes from 'prop-types' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const AddBus = ({ }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ vehicleNo: "", busName: "", agency: "", seats: 0, busStaff:0, busType: "", agency: " ", seatCategory: "", policy: "", image: "", from: "", to: "", arrivalTime: "", departureTime: "" }) const { vehicleNo, busName, busStaff, agency, seats, busType, seatCategory, policy, from, to, arrivalTime, departureTime, } = formData const [image, setImage] = useState(); const [secdule, setScedule] = useState(); const pushDays = function (e) { if (!secdule.includes(e.target.value)) { setScedule([...secdule, e.target.value]) } } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (to === from) { alert("can't Add same start and end city", "danger"); } else { console.log({ busName, agency, vehicleNo, seats, busType, seatCategory, busStaff, policy, image, from, to, arrivalTime, departureTime }) } } const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (
onSubmit(e)}>
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter Bus Name" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter Vehicle No" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the seats 10" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter Ac or NonAc" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter sleeper or semi sleeper" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the bus staff phone number"/>
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the policy" />
setImage(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter the link of the image" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the city name" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the city name" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the arrivalTime" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the departureTime" />
secdule {' '}
pushDays(e)} />
pushDays(e)} />
{' '} pushDays(e)} />
pushDays(e)} />
pushDays(e)} />
pushDays(e)} />
pushDays(e)} />
) } AddBus.propTypes = { // addBus: propTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, {})(AddBus)
